title: Red velvet whoopie pies
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '120g unsalted butter, softened', '145g light brown sugar', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '120ml buttermilk', 'red food colouring (see footnote)']
